Detailed Description

An abstract base class that all CoreData errors are derived from.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const char* className (  )  const [virtual]

Returns the name of the class as a string without any namespace qualifiers.

This function enables script wrappers to map from C++ exceptions to script-domain exception classes. It should return the name of the class (as given after the 'class' keyword.)

Reimplemented in EngineOutputDataFileError, SerialPortError, SocketError, SerializableError, GeomUtilsError, and OutputDataUtilsError.
